channel.title: I have to reload the client?
channel.description:
Ok, this is rather annoying, and I have not figured it out. I am rather bad client-sided, tbh.
On my server, if you do the following things, you have to close your client, and open another one because the client nulls with a black screen saying, "Please Wait".:
Go up a floor in Slayer Tower. Go in the Castle Wars area* (Can't even get inside the building). Go next to the House Portal in Taverly*. Go into the hidden tunnel in Barrows.
Ok, for the ones that did not have an asterisk (*), when you reload the client it works.
The ones that did have the asterisk (*), you cannot even log back in; Your account becomes nulled.
I really have no idea why this happens. Someone help me?
This is a PI server and a Nick's Emulation Client.

item.title: I have to reload the client?
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

Ok, this is rather annoying, and I have not figured it out. I am rather bad client-sided, tbh.

On my server, if you do the following things, you have to close your client, and open another one because the client nulls with a black screen saying, “Please Wait”.:

Go up a floor in Slayer Tower.
Go in the Castle Wars area* (Can’t even get inside the building).
Go next to the House Portal in Taverly*.
Go into the hidden tunnel in Barrows.

Ok, for the ones that did not have an asterisk (*), when you reload the client it works.

The ones that did have the asterisk (*), you cannot even log back in; Your account becomes nulled.

I really have no idea why this happens. Someone help me?

This is a PI server and a Nick’s Emulation Client.
